meanings.definition: Having small, rounded projections or crescent-shaped markings.
meanings.sent1: The lunulated pattern on the butterfly's wings was beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The seashell was decorated with lunulated designs.
meanings.sent3: The lunulated clouds in the sky looked like smiling faces.
meanings.sent4: Her lunulated necklace added a touch of elegance to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The lunulated stars twinkled in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Marked with small, rounded projections or crescent-shaped markings.
meanings.sent1: The lunulated edges of the leaves made them unique.
meanings.sent2: The ancient vase was lunulated with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent3: The lunulated shadows on the wall resembled dancing figures.
meanings.sent4: The lunulated border on the painting added depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The lunulated pattern on the rug gave the room a cozy feel.
